level1.subject: Security Alert: Your Account is Scheduled for Suspension
level1.context: Dear Valued Customer, our systems detected unauthorized access attempts on your account. To prevent financial loss, your access will be suspended in 30 minutes. Please click below to verify your identity immediately: http://bit.ly/secure-login-3921

choices.text: Click the link and enter login details immediately
Reply to the email asking for confirmation
Ignore the link and open the official bank app
Call the bank using the number on the back of your card

level1.explanation: Scammers impersonate banks and create urgency so victims act without verifying. Legitimate banks never ask for credentials via email links.

level2.context: Hey! I've really enjoyed talking this week. I'm actually traveling near your city, but my banking app is locked and I can't pay for my taxi to the hotel. Could you quickly send $40 to my friend's PayPal? I'll pay you back double when I check in!

choices.text: Send the money immediately to help her out
Ask for her bank details to try a different way
Suggest she contact her bank or family for help
Report the profile for suspicious financial requests

level2.explanation: Romance scammers build quick emotional bonds and then create a 'minor crisis' to test if you will send money.

level2.subject: Interview Selection: Remote Data Analyst Role
level2.context: Congratulations! You have been shortlisted for the Data Analyst position. Before we schedule your final interview with the manager, a one-time refundable document processing fee of $25 is required to activate your profile in our system.

choices.text: Pay the small amount since it seems reasonable
Negotiate and ask if payment can be done later
Refuse to pay and ask for official company verification
Check the companyâ€™s official website for hiring policies

level2.explanation: Once a victim pays a small amount, scammers increase demands. Legitimate employers do not charge fees for interviews.

level3.subject: LEGAL NOTICE: Discrepancy in PAN/Aadhaar Linking
level3.context: FINAL WARNING: Our records show a discrepancy in your tax filings. Failure to update your KYC details immediately via the link below will result in a penalty of $500 and potential legal action under Section 144. Click here to resolve: http://gov-portal-verify.in

choices.text: Submit the requested details immediately
Call the number provided in the email
Verify the claim through official government portals
Ignore the message and report it as phishing

level3.explanation: Government agencies do not demand sensitive information via emails or links. Fear is used to force quick compliance.
